column4: Hey, since my Update to Gutsy my Skype isnt working anymore, hopefully someone can help me. Here are some Infos about my System: http://ubuntuusers.de/paste/17909/
what version of skype are you running? and have you tried installing the latest?
i am running Skype 1.4, which worked under Feisty. I tested Skype 2.0 Beta, same Error. Soundcard seems to be blockaded, on the other hand, http://ubuntuusers.de/paste/17909/ doesnt say so
Btw, Ekiga doesnt run on that souncard, too
cool. i take it you checked the sound device options in sype itself?
yes bofh80
occasionally i had to change the device option, save quit, come in change save quit, and then it works :S
- thx for your answers btw ;-) Im trying that now, but i tried it already ...
oop the options have changed, it used to be the OSD ALSA choice that fixed it
i am using 1.4 on 7.10, no probs really, works better than before.
Skype > 1.4 doesnt give you the possibilty anymore th decide between oss and alsa, tis also by default
